entry.title: WIND WARNING , St. Catharines
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:41 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 14.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 1:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 14.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 58 %
Dewpoint: 6.1°C
Wind: SW 50 km/h gust 67 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 100. High 17. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 100 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
